title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.13 - Veterinarians
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.13 - Veterinarians

State Regulations

During racing hours, and any time a horse is raced upon
the race track, the racing association shall provide the services of a
veterinarian, within or immediately adjacent to the paddock. Said veterinarian
shall be equipped with all the instruments, materials and equipment necessary
that might affect the health of the horse while on the race
track. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4104.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
